Works on both kids and adults

customer_reviews.title: Ex aveeno eczema therapy user!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap and the brand! Would recommend as we even use the lotion on our child that has had eczema for three years. It works well and my sons hasn’t broken out using it. He breaks out easy on so many other eczema products. We used to use aveeno eczema products but they are made by Johnson and Johnson and I don’t trust their products any longer. So this is our new line of products we use and love it. Look into their whole line of eczema products
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, soothes skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! My 4 year old has eczema and when we use this on a daily basis he has no eczema, no itching! His doctor had prescribed steroid cream for his itchiness but I wasn't comfortable with using steroids. This is a great natural product that works and soothes his skin even with his super sensitivity to touch. We also use the lotion from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well worth spending the money! My daughter has a really bad eczema with the dry air in the area we live in. I tried everything on her skin. Definitely helps from dry crusted flair ups! Love it. Will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: EDNA

customer_reviews.text: So it works well for one day and then the eczema comes back the very next day. Even with cortisone cream it still comes back. Maybe it's just my child but I think this is a decent product when first applied.

customer_reviews.title: Gently cleansing
customer_reviews.text: The Natralia Happy Little Bodies Eczema Shampoo and Wash gently cleanses my son's skin without irritating his eyes or drying out his sensitive skin. It rinses clean and leaves him feeling soft and smelling fresh. I was very pleased with all these Natralia products, they worked well for us and I love that they are all made with natural ingredients.

feature_bullets: KIDS ECZEMA BODY WASH & SHAMPOO: A gentle, tear-free & soap-free 2-in-1 body wash & shampoo formulated to help relieve your little one's eczema symptoms. Non-irritating, pH balanced for kids & babies.

KIDS ECZEMA RELIEF: Natralia's effective 3-step solution for managing symptoms of eczema includes rash relief cream, soap-free body wash/shampoo and daily moisturizing lotion. Formulated with Colloidal Oatmeal to gently soothe itchy skin.
GENTLE & EFFECTIVE: Natralia's nature-inspired skin care solutions are safe and gentle for sensitive skin, yet effective in treating and relieving dry or itchy skin, bringing fast-acting relief.

PLANT-BASED SKIN CARE: Natralia grew from a father's desire to help his son, who suffered from Eczema. Working alongside experienced pharmacists, he developed Natralia, using plant-derived ingredients.

NOURISH SKIN NATURALLY: Try Natralia for excema & psoriasis, dry & itchy skin, & restorative foot care treatments. All products are free from petro-chemicals, parabens, steroids, cortisone & artificial fragrance.
